about_the_game:
Experience the game where it all began the way the developer intended the game to be.

Various new features present in Intravenous 2 were meant to be included in the first game, but were ultimately cut due to time & budget constraints.

This campaign port is as much a port as it is "Intravenous 1 2.0" - keeping the feel of the original, while adapting the game levels to the new gameplay mechanics of the sequel, and bringing a level of polish to the overall package to make it a much better experience all around.

Key features:

  • Updated game levels. The campaign looks & plays better with improved layouts, new routes to allow for more gameplay variety, and are adapted to the game design of Intravenous 2.
  • Updated soundtrack. VIP (variation in production) tracks for all levels, including new tracks for levels that didn't have their own, by the extremely talented Xtrullor.
  • Refined narrative. Dialogues and cutscenes received changes to keep narrative quality consistent, while preserving the atmosphere of the first game.
  • Bells & whistles. Experience all the improvements done to the sequel in this campaign remaster. Want an even bigger juxtaposition? Try playing the original after this.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains depiction of the drug use

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2125, AMD Phenom II X4 960 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB VRAM, Radeon Vega 7/GTX 1030/Intel Iris 550 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 Normal settings, 60+ FPS
